definition: not canned or otherwise preserved, very recently
details:
adjective
- not canned or otherwise preserved
= example: not canned or otherwise preserved
- not containing or composed of salt water
= example: not containing or composed of salt water
= synonyms: sweet
- imparting vitality and energy
= synonyms: brisk, bracing, refreshing, refreshful, tonic
- (of a cycle) beginning or occurring again
= example: (of a cycle) beginning or occurring again
- original and of a kind not seen before
= synonyms: new, novel
- free from impurities
= synonyms: fine
- not soured or preserved
= synonyms: sweet, unfermented
- with restored energy
= synonyms: invigorated, refreshed, reinvigorated
- having recently calved and therefore able to give milk
= example: having recently calved and therefore able to give milk
- improperly forward or bold
= example: improperly forward or bold
= synonyms: smart, impertinent, impudent, overbold, saucy, sassy, wise
- not yet used or soiled
= example: not yet used or soiled
= synonyms: unused
- recently made, produced, or harvested
= example: recently made, produced, or harvested
adverb
- very recently
= synonyms: new
